duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and oversee the entire scope of site activities during ITO and/or OTR phase, ensuring compliance with contractual obligations, company policy, and local regulations.
Lead and manage the site team to execute the project scope of work, including multiple sites for the project.
Utilize in-depth knowledge of a technical discipline and analytical thinking to execute policy/strategy, with a focus on project management and site management.
Act as a resource for colleagues with less experience and may lead small projects with low risks and resource requirements.
Convey performance expectations, handle sensitive issues, and explain information to bring team members to consensus within the field.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s))
